name: DuckStationARM
description:
Fast PlayStation 1 emulator for Windows ARM32 (UWP) with min 15035
Support GPUs with DirectX 11 Feature Level 10+ (Level 9.3 and build 14393 is not ready yet)
DuckStation is PS1 emulator by Connor McLaughlin (stenzek)
This emulator is really good and fast even on old ARM devices like Windows Phone, all credits goes to stenzek
changelog:
- Added new options to improve GamePad support
- Added sensors support
- More speed controls for better performance
- Fixed issue caused system to hung while closing
- Fixed Keyboard input bindings
- Added more controller profiles (1,2,3 & 4)
- Improved & fixed Resume feature
- Improved old devices support (still under software render)
